adjectives.description: incantatory (comparative more incantatory, superlative most incantatory)

entries.meaning: Constituting, employing, dealing with, or suitable for use in incantation.
examples: Fortune tellers, Juglers, Geomancers, and the like incantatory impostors, though commonly men of inferiour rank, and from whom without illumination they can expect no more then from themselves, do daily and professedly delude them.
